      • getTower

        public Tower getTower(int x,
                      int y)
        Given a specified location this returns the tower that is located at (x,y). If there is no tower at the location given then this returns null.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of potential enemy location
        y - coordinate of potential enemy location
        Returns:
        the tower located at (x,y) (if there is one)

      • getEnemy

        public Enemy getEnemy(int x,
                      int y)
        Given a specified location this returns the enemy that is located at (x,y). If there is no enemy at the location given then this returns null.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of potential enemy location
        y - coordinate of potential enemy location
        Returns:
        the enemy located at (x,y) (if there is one)
